ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So the angels prostrated, all of them together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then the angels bowed before him in a body,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then the angels, all of them, prostrated themselves before Adam
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: all the angel then prostrated themselves
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So all the angels prostrated, every one, without exception.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, the angels prostrated themselves, all of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the angels did obeisance, all of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then the angels bowed themselves all together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The angels fell down prostrate, every one,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Thereupon the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The angels prostrated themselves, all of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereat the angels prostrated, all of them together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So all the angels prostrated themselves
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So the angels fell prostrate, all of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:73] Thereat the angels prostrated, all of them together (there are two emphases here [kulluhum and ajma‘ūn]);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The angels fell down prostrate, every one) before Adam.
